verses.verse: It is <S%G191>reported<s%> <S%G3654>commonly<s%> that there is <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, and <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> as is not <S%G3761>so<s%> <S%G3761>much<s%> as <S%G3687>named<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> should <S%G2192>have<s%> his <S%G3962>father's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

And you are <S%G5448>puffed<s%> up, and <S%G2192>have<s%> not <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G3996>mourned,<s%> that he that has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> might be <S%G1808>taken<s%> away from <S%G3319>among<s%> you.

For I <S%G3303>truly,<s%> as <S%G548>absent<s%> in <S%G4983>body,<s%> but <S%G3918>present<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> have <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> as though I were <S%G3918>present,<s%> concerning him that has <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2716>done<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> deed,

In the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> when you are <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> and my <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> with the <S%G1411>power<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

To <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> an one to <S%G4567>Satan<s%> for the <S%G3639>destruction<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> that the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> may be <S%G4982>saved<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G5216>Your<s%> <S%G2745>glorying<s%> is not <S%G2570>good.<s%> <S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leavens<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump?<s%>

<S%G1571>Purge<s%> out <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> that you may be a <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G5445>lump,<s%> as you are <S%G106>unleavened.<s%> For <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G3957>passover<s%> is <S%G2380>sacrificed<s%> for us:

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> let us <S%G1858>keep<s%> the <S%G1858>feast,<s%> not with <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> with the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G2549>malice<s%> and <S%G4189>wickedness;<s%> but with the <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread of <S%G1505>sincerity<s%> and <S%G225>truth.<s%>
I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you in an <S%G1992>letter<s%> not to <S%G4874>company<s%> with <S%G4205>fornicators:<s%>

<S%G2532>Yet<s%> not <S%G3843>altogether<s%> with the <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with the <S%G4123>covetous,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G727>extortionists,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G1496>idolaters;<s%> for <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G3784>must<s%> you needs <S%G1831>go<s%> out of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you not to <S%G4874>keep<s%> <S%G4874>company,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man that is <S%G3687>called<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%> be a <S%G4205>fornicator,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4123>covetous,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3060>reviler,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3183>drunkard,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G727>extortionist;<s%> with <S%G5108>such<s%> an one no not to <S%G4906>eat.<s%>
For <S%G5101>what<s%> have I to do to <S%G2919>judge<s%> them <S%G2532>also<s%> that are <S%G1854>without?<s%> do not you <S%G2919>judge<s%> them that are <S%G2080>within?<s%>

But them that are <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2919>judges.<s%> Therefore <S%G1808>put<s%> <S%G1808>away<s%> from among <S%G5216>yourselves<s%> <S%G846><s%> that <S%G4190>wicked<s%> person.
